channel.title: The Last Shard 317 running 377 cache 474 models and objects
channel.description:
317 running a 377 cache with 474 models and objects.
[b]Client (Need Client To Login) [/b] [b][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?yt5ywdiigtn]http://www.mediafire.com/?yt5ywdiigtn[/url][/b]
[b]Forums:[/b] [b][url=http://474revolution.tk]http://474revolution.tk[/url][/b]
[b][U]Client Updates[/U][/b]
fixed friends list and combat showing. SkillCape emotes looking better.
- 474 Interfaces, really 474 not 508.(Added a few custom.) - Repositioned gameframe a bit. - Added newer maps. (Godwars/Warriors Guild/Godwars Entrance) - Added toggles for: - Custom loginscreen / regular loginscreen. - Names above head (NPC and player.)(PROPERLY!) - Newer context menu / regular context menu. - Newer HPBar / old HPBar. - IDs of Objects / NPCs / Items also have a toggle, in client.java. - All of the toggles are handled client-side, and have an interface. - Text is also client-sided. - RSInterface re-factored more. - Context menus over gameframe. - Fixed the maps/object bugs. - Added a few missing things (Like menus, EX. "Report Abuse".) - Added a Gui, and added a few things to it. - Worldmap and an ItemList in Tools DDM(Drop down menu). - Has all features from AMG a bears release as well. - All 474 Items / NPCs / Objects / Graphics / Animations.
[b][U]Server Updates[/U][/b] Server Features Fully working sc emotes Amazing combat Fairly accurate accuracy formulas (tweaked a lot) Fully functional clan chat 3/4 godwar bosses Amazing npc drop system Fight Pits Pest Control Barrows Fight Caves (360 onwards, easy to add all ways, just build on the array) Quite a few skills (some half-assed) All 474 items (loaded through cache) Most pots work, very easy to add more Most food work, very east to add more 100% Potion dose mixing Base for skill menus Piety + chivalry Perfect prayer draining Custom infinity/mage book minigame Working obelisks Perfect prayer draining and protection prayer delay in pvp
[b]All SkillScape Emotes Fully Working![/b] [b][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aq9oNrRhLmk]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aq9oNrRhLmk[/url][/b]
[IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/11.png[/img][IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/4.png[/img][IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/2.png[/img]
[b]Godwars[/b]
[IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/graaa.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/saraa.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/armaa.gif[/img]
[b]Pest Control[/b]
[IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/pc-2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/pc-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/pc2.png[/img]
[b]Fight Pits[/b]
[IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/fp.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/fp1.png[/img]
[b]Duel Arena[/b]
[IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/da1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/da2.png[/img]
[b]Barrows[/b]
[IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/brrrrr.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/brr.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/brrr.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/br.png[/img]
[b]Slayer[/b]
[IMG]http://i843.photobucket.com/albums/zz360/AsertOne/12.png[/img]

item.title: The Last Shard 317 running 377 cache 474 models and objects
item.dc:creator: @RunePlanet RunePlanet
item.description:
@RunePlanet wrote:

317 running a 377 cache with 474 models and objects.

Client (Need Client To Login)
http://www.mediafire.com/?yt5ywdiigtn

Forums:
http://474revolution.tk

Client Updates

fixed friends list and combat showing.
SkillCape emotes looking better.

  • 474 Interfaces, really 474 not 508.(Added a few custom.)
  • Repositioned gameframe a bit.
  • Added newer maps. (Godwars/Warriors Guild/Godwars Entrance)
  • Added toggles for:
  • Custom loginscreen / regular loginscreen.
  • Names above head (NPC and player.)(PROPERLY!)
  • Newer context menu / regular context menu.
  • Newer HPBar / old HPBar.
  • IDs of Objects / NPCs / Items also have a toggle, in client.java.
  • All of the toggles are handled client-side, and have an interface.
  • Text is also client-sided.
  • RSInterface re-factored more.
  • Context menus over gameframe.
  • Fixed the maps/object bugs.
  • Added a few missing things (Like menus, EX. “Report Abuse”.)
  • Added a Gui, and added a few things to it.
  • Worldmap and an ItemList in Tools DDM(Drop down menu).
  • Has all features from AMG a bears release as well.
  • All 474 Items / NPCs / Objects / Graphics / Animations.

Server Updates
Server Features
Fully working sc emotes
Amazing combat
Fairly accurate accuracy formulas (tweaked a lot)
Fully functional clan chat
3/4 godwar bosses
Amazing npc drop system
Fight Pits
Pest Control
Barrows
Fight Caves (360 onwards, easy to add all ways, just build on the array)
Quite a few skills (some half-assed)
All 474 items (loaded through cache)
Most pots work, very easy to add more
Most food work, very east to add more
100% Potion dose mixing
Base for skill menus
Piety + chivalry
Perfect prayer draining
Custom infinity/mage book minigame
Working obelisks
Perfect prayer draining and protection prayer delay in pvp

All SkillScape Emotes Fully Working!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aq9oNrRhLmk

Godwars



Pest Control

Fight Pits

Duel Arena

Barrows

Slayer

Pking Videos (More Coming Soon!)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c0SgmQRLfcM

Read full topic
